summary: Tested 5 high-impact SEO features: Top 100 page, FAQ schema, Breadcrumb navigation, Dynamic meta descriptions, and sitemap updates. All features working correctly.

details.page_title: Top 100 Most Subscribed YouTube Channels 2026 - Global Rankings
details.full_ranking_list: Complete 100 channel list with rank badges
details.faq_section: 4 expandable FAQ questions with schema markup
details.internal_links: Explore More Rankings section with 4 links

sitemap_top100_url.note: Root /sitemap.xml may return cached version but /api/sitemap.xml is correct

context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO implementation complete. Top 100 page at /top-100 with full channel rankings, FAQ section with schema markup, and breadcrumb navigation. Breadcrumb component displays on Country, Channel, and Top100 pages with correct hierarchy and BreadcrumbList schema. FAQSection component renders expandable questions with FAQPage schema on all pages. Footer includes 'Top 100 YouTubers' link in Rankings section. Sitemap at /api/sitemap.xml includes /top-100 URL (root sitemap may cache old version).
